ygData.subject: Re: Hello Everyone
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/22/99 12:35:48 AM Pacific Daylight Time, vatigerboy@erols.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/22/99 12:35:48 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
vatigerboy@... writes:

<< I have 3 Chars on Veeshan, 1 on Test, 2 on Cazic and 3 on Rellos. Its not
that I play a great deal (only about 3 to 4 hours a day), but its nice having
a variety. Also I just made a Monk (God are those Humans ugly, hehe) that is
currently in the Freeport area on the new server. His name is Kyte, stop by
and say hi if your on >>


Yes humans are ugly!! Now nthose little wood elf studs and barb hunks...
whooo baby!


--Thyndo@cazic
